A collection of sites I've built.

WaggyDogz

  • WordPress
  • WooCommerce
  • Webshop
  • Redesign

WaggyDogz sells products such as Cards, Mugs & Cushions featuring animal designs, predominantly dogs however they sell all sorts of other anmials.

I was tasked with redesigning their old website and introducing a new online shop for their customers. The solution runs on WooCommerce for WordPress.

Visit Site

SerenityBlu

  • WordPress

SerenityBlu run a beauty rooms. They wanted a website which matched their current branding and provided their customers with information about their business and their latest offers.

I used WordPress to provide a CMS in order for them to add and update the information about latest products and offers.
